title: Junkyard Thresh
body:
I think the theme of garbage and rubbish from {{champion:48}}'s Junkyard skin would translate very well visually, maybe not lore-ifically, into {{champion:412}}.
The hook would become a crane hook as well as his hair with very rusty brown/red colour themes.
- His "souls" could just be steam? or nuts and bolts, floating.
Or maybe everytime a soul drops it could be just random parts and pieces, nuts, bolts, screws, washers, flat pieces of metal, etc all with the same colour to make it stand out.His coat would be metal and leathery.
- His Q would work similarly to live.
- His W would be an old Oil Lamp.
- His E would work similarly to live.
- His Ult would have broken down fences, lamposts and maybe glass windows in some instances.

I think it's pretty cool.
